name: Lost Mermaid
text: When Lost Mermaid enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
{2}{U}: Return Lost Mermaid to its owner's hand.

name: Questing Wizard
text: Whenever Questing Wizard deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the amount of damage dealt by Questing Wizard this turn. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then shuffle your library.

name: Weird Dingo
text: Trample. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Bizarre Behemoth is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return it to the battlefield. It transforms into Weird Dingo.

name: Strange Gnome
text: When Strange Gnome enters the battlefield, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: "Curiosity is the gnome's greatest strength, and their strangeness is just a side effect."

name: Funny Barbarian
text: Whenever Funny Barbarian attacks, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.
flavor: "Who needs a sword when you can slay your enemies with laughter?"

name: Goofy Packleader
text: Whenever Goofy Packleader deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: "Who said werewolves can't have a sense of humor?"

name: Forgotten Zombie
text: When Forgotten Zombie enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card at random.
flavor: "Once a forgotten soul, now a relentless force of decay."

name: Enchanted Mermaid
text:
When Enchanted Mermaid enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
Enchanted Mermaid has hexproof as long as it's enchanted.
